summary: Complete retexture of Whiterun exterior. Lore and FPS friendly.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center]
[font=Georgia][size=5][b][center]Authentic Whiterun
[size=3]Lore and fps friendly textures

By Laast

Authentic Cities project also includes:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73943/?]Authentic Solitude[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74100/?]Authentic Riften[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75027/?]Authentic Windhelm[/url]

[img]http://lastrie01.free.fr/ACW01.jpg[/img]

This textures pack replaces every vanilla exterior textures of Whiterun. It aims to give a natural and beautiful looking to one of the most important cities of Skyrim.

[img]http://lastrie01.free.fr/ACW02.jpg[/img]
[/size]
[size=3]Whiterun is an old city, built a long time ago with Nordic wood, stone and blood. Authentic Whiterun brings this feeling and gives real vibes to every adventurers who go through its door.

[img]http://lastrie01.free.fr/ACW03.jpg[/img][/size][/center][/b][/size][/font]
[b][size=3][center][b][size=3][font=Georgia]Initialy this textures pack was made for [/font][font=Georgia][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65242/?]Purity[/url] as an optional file, but obviously it was a simplier solution to create a new, stand alone file. So people who don't use or know Purity can also enjoy my work.


[img]http://lastrie01.free.fr/ACW04.jpg[/img][/font][/size][/b][/center][/size][/b]
[b][size=3][center][/center][font=Georgia][size=5][center]FAQ

[size=3][u][size=4]- What resolution are these textures?[/size][/u]
[i]Globaly they are twice the vanilla size. As usual in my mods, I try to find the best balance between great visual and no framerate loss. This mod doesn't go against that rule.

[/i][u][size=4]- Will you make UHD/4k versions?[/size][/u]
[i]Nope, no need to ask.

[u][size=4]- [/size][/u][/i][u][size=4]Is it compatible with my city overhaul?[/size][/u]
[i]Yes, as long as your overhaul uses vanilla textures for extra items/objects added. In any way, it WILL be compatible but I can't promise it will be visualy nice.

[/i][size=4][u]- Will you work on other cities?[/u]
[i][size=3]Yes!

[/size][/i][size=3][size=4][u]- What ENB/mods did you use in your screenies?[/u]
[i][size=3]No ENB, only [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65242/?]Purity[/url].

[youtube]Gu_Bv9XjMlA[/youtube][/size][/i][/size][/size][/size][/size][/center][size=3][size=4][size=3][size=4]

[size=2]Credits:
CGtextures.com
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6550607]AlcoholSwabs[/url] for his capital symbols.[/size]
[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/font]
[/size][/b]
author: Laast

files.name: Alternative roof with vanilla yellow color.
